REACT_APP_SFMC_CLIENTID.description: The Client Id of your installed package within SFMC

REACT_APP_SFMC_CLIENTSECRET.description: The Client Secret of your installed package within SFMC

REACT_APP_SFMC_STACK.description: The stack your instance is on (i.e. 's4', 's7', etc.)

REACT_APP_SFMC_ORIGIN.description: The REST Base URI of your installed package within SFMC

REACT_APP_SFMC_AUTHORIGIN.description: The Authentication Base URI of your installed package within SFMC

REACT_APP_SFMC_SOAPORIGIN.description: The SOAP Base URI of your installed package within SFMC

INLINE_RUNTIME_CHUNK.description: WARNING: DO NOT CHANGE - Disables the webpack runtime logic that React includes in the index.html file. This is done to prevent issues with Content Security Policy

IMAGE_INLINE_SIZE_LIMIT.description: WARNING: DO NOT CHANGE - Prevents React from inlining images smaller than 10kB in the index.html file. This is done to prevent issues with Content Security Policy
